snippet.textDisplay: This theme is about as iconic to me as pretty much any theme in the Zelda series. When I played Ocarina back in the day, I had no idea it wasn't the first version of that theme. Thank goodness I know better now!

snippet.textDisplay: Over rated?  Ridiculous.  Lttp and oot deserve all their kudos.  Anyone arguing otherwise either didn't play them when they came out, yes context matters, or is being a troll.

snippet.textDisplay: Spirit Tracks was an unneccessary re-tread, in my opinon. Phantom Hourglass was a very cool game that utilises the stylus perfectly. It also had amazing charm and atmosphere, although not quite as great as Wind Waker in that regard. It's not a 2D Zelda game though, it's basically its own style of the series.
snippet.textOriginal: Spirit Tracks was an unneccessary re-tread, in my opinon. Phantom Hourglass was a very cool game that utilises the stylus perfectly. It also had amazing charm and atmosphere, although not quite as great as Wind Waker in that regard. It's not a 2D Zelda game though, it's basically its own style of the series.

snippet.textDisplay:
Atmosphere of OoT, with more puzzles like the 3D games, but a 2D game stylized like LttP, with optional up to 4 players, tons of dungeons(not just the usual 4-8, talking 10-16), tons of items(like LttP or the N64 games), and a massive world to explore, and an epic story(like LttP, OoT, or Skyward Sword)
This would make for hands down the greatest Zelda.
snippet.textOriginal:
Atmosphere of OoT, with more puzzles like the 3D games, but a 2D game stylized like LttP, with optional up to 4 players, tons of dungeons(not just the usual 4-8, talking 10-16), tons of items(like LttP or the N64 games), and a massive world to explore, and an epic story(like LttP, OoT, or Skyward Sword)
This would make for hands down the greatest Zelda.

snippet.textDisplay: I honestly think A Link to the Past is among the top 3 Zelda Games(Ocarina of Time and WindWaker being the other two). At this point I don't even bother comparing the new 2D offerings to it; they just can't stand up to it's glory.
snippet.textOriginal: I honestly think A Link to the Past is among the top 3 Zelda Games(Ocarina of Time and WindWaker being the other two). At this point I don't even bother comparing the new 2D offerings to it; they just can't stand up to it's glory.

snippet.textDisplay: Probably one of the most known village theme in a video game. The version in Ocarina of Time is just as peaceful. I really miss playing new 2D Zelda games, especially since the DS iterations left such a bad taste in my mouth. I'd pay a lot of money to play a brand new 2D Zelda game with HD graphics that look as amazing as games like the upcoming Rayman Legends for the Wii U.
snippet.textOriginal: Probably one of the most known village theme in a video game. The version in Ocarina of Time is just as peaceful. I really miss playing new 2D Zelda games, especially since the DS iterations left such a bad taste in my mouth. I'd pay a lot of money to play a brand new 2D Zelda game with HD graphics that look as amazing as games like the upcoming Rayman Legends for the Wii U.
